items.sentence: I didn't know that Tom was still working here.
Some people say they like the smell of durian.
There are people who like the smell of durian.
My alarm clock didn't wake me up this morning.
How many hours has it been since you've eaten.
There's a possibility that that rumor is true.
If you don't hurry, you'll be late for school.
Please be careful not to get in anybody's way.
Tom was as thin as a rail when he was a child.
Tom was doing the same thing that I was doing.
I'm now over 60 and no one will give me a job.
I'm now over 60 and nobody will give me a job.
Mary was wearing the dress you bought for her.
It's time to go to bed, so turn the radio off.
It's time to go to bed, so turn off the radio.
Tom is very good at reading between the lines.
Mary isn't Tom granddaughter. She's his niece.
I don't like him because he's as sly as a fox.
There's a good view of Mt. Fuji from upstairs.
To hear him talk, you might think he's a girl.
I can't understand her way of thinking at all.
They're all clamoring to get their money back.
An hour's walk brought me to the next village.
The fact is that they don't have enough money.
I thought it would be better to remain silent.
Tom looked at Mary with a condescending smile.
I can't imagine sharing an apartment with Tom.
I haven't seen Tom around here in a long time.
I haven't worn a suit and tie since I retired.
What kind of chores do you have to do at home?
Do you really think I care about what happens?
Tom and Mary experienced happy times together.
Tom believes you have something to do with it.
Tom and I think we can take care of ourselves.
Tom said he was happy that you didn't do that.
Tom told Mary that I was motivated to do that.
Tom told me he was the one who had to do that.
Tom told me he was planning to leave his wife.
Have you finished your Christmas shopping yet?
Tom is a better saxophone player than Mary is.
I've been in love with you since we were kids.
Mom never loved me the same way she loved you.
Tom has been saving a little money each month.
Tom knew what would happen if he didn't do it.
Mary was hoping that Tom would propose to her.
Mary bought herself a new dress for the dance.
Construction is set to begin later this month.
Tom made sure everything was set up correctly.
The rocket blew up a few seconds after launch.
You need to learn to talk about your feelings.
